sentences.en: And it is from this extended sense of connection that the magnitude of changes, the rapidity of changes, can truly begin to take place.
sentences.cn: 并且在这扩展延伸的连接感觉当中强度会发生改变，而且是迅速的改变，这会真实的开始并且发生。

sentences.en: And the parrot would say , with great rapidity ,'Pieces of eight!
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉听后立刻急促地叫道:“八个 里亚尔!

sentences.en: Animal and vegetable pests propagate with extreme rapidity.
Animal and vegetable pests spread with extreme rapidity.
Disease of animal and vegetable pests propagate with extreme rapidity.
Fielding was not surprised at the rapidity of their intimacy.
sentences.cn: 菲尔丁对这种一见如故的样子并不觉得奇怪.

sentences.en: Her character ripened and developed with frightfully rapidity.
sentences.cn: 她的性格以可怕的速度成熟着、发展着.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Tito's quick mind had been combining ideas with lightening - like rapidity.
sentences.cn: 这时候, 蒂托的灵敏头脑,以闪电那样的迅速,把许多事情联系了起来.

sentences.en: That Beijing was stung was apparent in the rapidity of its reply.
sentences.cn: 北京的答复异常迅速,明显地表明它被刺痛了.

sentences.en: The film shows the rapidity of the changes in this area of medicine.
sentences.cn: 这部电影展示了这一医学领域里的迅速变化.

sentences.en: The number of terms actually used depends upon the rapidity of the convergence.
sentences.cn: 实际要用的项数的多少取决于收敛的快慢程度.

sentences.en: The operation, to be successful, had to be carried out with great rapidity.
sentences.cn: 这个工作要做得好, 就必须做得快.

sentences.en: The soldiers loaded and discharged with great rapidity.
sentences.cn: 士兵们迅速装子弹发射.

sentences.en: The strength of the current depends on the rapidity of movement.
sentences.cn: 电流的强度取决于运动的速度.

sentences.en: The styles change with bewildering rapidity.
sentences.cn: 风格多变,令人应接不暇.

sentences.en: The water rushed through the holes with great rapidity.
sentences.cn: 湍急的水流奔涌过洞口。

words.tran_cn: 迅速的，急促的；飞快的；险峻的
急流；高速交通工具，高速交通网

trans.tran_cn: 迅速，急速，速度，险峻，快度
